subject: VPN Connection Issue - Samsung Phone
body: Hi, I'm unable to connect to the VPN from my Samsung Galaxy phone. Getting authentication failed error. This is urgent as I need to access internal systems for a critical task. Please help ASAP.

suggested_actions: Verify user credentials and authentication method
Reset VPN profile on the Samsung device
Ensure device date and time are correct
Confirm VPN client configuration matches corporate settings
Escalate to Network Security team if issue persists

assistant_reply:
**Ticket:** VPN Connection Issue – Samsung Galaxy Phone  
**Category:** Mobile  
**Priority:** High (critical task)

---

## Quick‑Check Checklist (5‑minute)

| ✅ | Item | What to do |
|---|------|------------|
| 1 | **Internet connectivity** | Open a browser and load any external site (e.g., https://www.google.com). If the page doesn’t load, fix Wi‑Fi/Cellular first. |
| 2 | **Correct VPN profile** | Verify you are selecting the right VPN profile (e.g., “Corp‑VPN‑US‑1”). |
| 3 | **Username / password** | Re‑type your credentials. Watch for case‑sensitivity and extra spaces. |
| 4 | **Device date & time** | Settings → General Management → Date & time → **Enable “Automatic date & time”**. A drift of >5 min will cause authentication failures. |
| 5 | **VPN app version** | Open the Play Store → My apps & games → Update the VPN client (e.g., Cisco AnyConnect, Pulse Secure, FortiClient, etc.). |

If any of the above fails, resolve it first and try to connect again. If the problem persists, move on to the detailed troubleshooting steps.

---

## Detailed Troubleshooting Steps

### 1. Identify the VPN client you are using
| Client | Typical cause of “Authentication failed” | Quick fix |
|--------|------------------------------------------|-----------|
| **Cisco AnyConnect** | Wrong group name, expired password, missing certificate | Re‑enter group name; reset password; reinstall the client. |
| **Pulse Secure** | OTP / Duo prompt not answered, outdated client | Ensure Duo push/OTP is received; update app. |
| **FortiClient** | Certificate mismatch, split‑tunnel disabled | Re‑import the .p12 certificate; toggle split‑tunnel. |
| **Native Android VPN (IPSec/L2TP, IKEv2, OpenVPN)** |
